name: Event Registration Pro Calendar
author: EventRegistrationPro.com

sections.description:
Event Registration Pro Calendar is a WordPress Plugin for accepting online registrations for events, training classes, conferences, and seminars. Event Registration Pro Calendar is the best open source software for online event registration and event booking for your events and conference websites.

If you’re looking for a professional solution that offers a higher level of event management then you won’t be disappointed in Event Registration Pro Calendar.

Powerful Event Booking Engine

Manage all your event registrants with robust reports and management capabilities. Offer multiple ticket choices to your registrants. Customizable event registration forms allow the most demanding event registration requirements.

Flexible Display Options

Event Registration Pro has multiple ways to display your events. You can display your events in a calendar as well as 2 different list views. Each view has a individual settings so you can customize what is shown to your site visitors and users.

Proven Success

Join thousands of our customers that use Event Registration Pro Calendar for all their events. Event Registration Pro is used by Universities, Fortune 500 Companies, Government Organizations, Non-Profits, Celebrities, Training Institutions, Conference Organizers, and Hundreds of Industries Worldwide since 2007.

Visit our website for more information [EventRegistrationPro.com]: http://www.eventregistrationpro.com

Intuitive Dashboard

  • Easily view your registration growth for the month
  • See which events are performing best
  • Complete overview of your event statuses

Robust Reports

  • Printable attendee reports for every event
  • Export Reports To Excel Spreadsheet

Responsive Design

  • Your events are available on any mobile device
  • Built with Bootstrap CSS Framework
  • Intuitive layouts from desktops to smartphones

Registrant Management

  • Show an optional public attendee lists for any event
  • Send personalized emails to attendees
  • Automated event reminder emails
  • Group registration feature

Custom Registration Forms

  • 11 custom form field types
  • Every event can have its own unique form

Built In Calendar

  • Calendar shows events with expanding hover effects
  • Color highlighted events based on category colors
  • Show event images instead of event titles if needed

Event Lists

  • Two list layouts to choose from
  • Show available seats
  • Use intro text for enticing content

Email Templates

  • Use custom tags to personalize emails
  • Multiple templates for admins, organizers, confirmations, and reminders
  • Abandoned cart emails to help recover abandoned registrations

SEO/SEF Friendly

  • No 3rd party SEF extensions needed
  • Keywords and meta descriptions for each event.
  • Gets your events indexed by all major search engines

Helpful Tools

  • RSS Feed of your events
  • Users can add events to their favorite calendar program
  • Users can print event details

Venue Details

  • Add images and text to venue details
  • Hyperlink to venue website
  • Hyperlink to venue location in Google Maps

Extend the system with even more features using our Premium Add-Ons that include:
* Ticketing
* Recurring Events
* Discount Codes
* Stripe Payment Gateway
* Paypal Standard Payment Gateway
* Offline Payment Gateway

Optional installation and customization services are available.

PLEASE SEE OUR WEBSITE FOR OUR MASSIVE FEATURE LIST AND DEMO. WE SIMPLY DO NOT HAVE ROOM TO POST THEM ALL ON THIS LISTING.
Visit our website for more information at https://www.eventregistrationpro.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. In the left menu in WordPress go to Event Registration Pro>>Main Settings and begin configuring the plugin settings to suit your own needs.

Visit our website for more information at https://www.eventregistrationpro.com
sections.faq: Visit our website for more information at https://www.eventregistrationpro.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.13

  • FIX. Fixed cart and checkout page issue
  • FIX – Fixed the dateformat issue

1.0.12

  • FIX. Fixed already set header error while activate plugin
  • FIX. Fixed Event image not showing on category page
  • FIX. Fixed the right site section on single event detail page

1.0.11

  • FIX. Fixed Undefined notice error while enable debug mode
  • FIX. Fixed already set header error while activate plugin

1.0.10

  • FIX. Fixed Email validation issue
  • FIX. Event details description text and shortcode were not displaying properly.

1.0.9

  • FIX. Fixed array display on checkout page issue.
  • FIX. Page text and ERP shortcode displaying properly.
  • ENHANCEMENT- Added new condition and shown only valid event records

1.0.8

  • FIX. Fixed the add Registration form field issue on multilingual sites.

1.0.7

  • ENHANCEMENT- Added new settings in the main settings so you can select the default pages of the primary views. This will allow the admin to edit the page title and slug for the primary pages without affecting the operation of the plugin workflow.
  • FIX. Fixed the email sending issue.
  • FIX. Fixed the cart and checkout page responsive issues.

1.0.6

  • ENHANCEMENT- Added Form field description tooltip to show form field instructions on front end.
  • ENHANCEMENT- Changed the event thumbnail image setting to be inline with new layout changes.
  • FIX- Fixed a bug in previous version that did not show the event description and short description on the event details page.
  • FIX- Updated the language POT file to include translations for the items that the new layout updates did not include.

1.0.5

  • ENHANCEMENT- Updated the layout for the event details and cart pages to be more compatible with a wider range of templates and widths.
  • FIX- Fixed language translation issue on cart and checkout pages.
  • FIX- Fixed an issue where events were not shown on calendar in mobile views for small screen sizes.

1.0.4

  • ENHANCEMENT- All events in the event manager are now ordered by date column by default
  • FIX- fixed an issue with the main setting getting reset to default when plugin is deactivated and then activated again.
  • FIX- fixed wordpress screen option and help button conflict issue.

1.0.3

  • ENHANCEMENT- In the admin side event list, added Sort the columns “Dates, Location, Category” functinality.
  • ENHANCEMENT- Added event time in the Dates columns.
  • NEW- Added popup when plugin is activated and click accept button on popup you get an email regarding plugin documentation and added to the mailing list.
  • ENHANCEMENT – Language translation issue

1.0.2

  • FIX – Fixed the dateformat issue
  • ENHANCEMENT – Removed page templates for 4 primary pages and used shortcodes instead.

1.0.1

  • NEW – Added support for the Discount Code Add-On.
  • FIX – Fixed pagination for front end list views.
  • FIX – Fixed destoyed menu issue and layout brock issue
  • FIX – Fixed the dateformat issue

1.0.0

  • Initial release
